title: 8 Awesome (and Free!) Apps For Your Next Big Road Trip The Points Guy

type_specific.selection: Intrepid traveler and TPG contributor Ryan Gargiulo recently completed an epic cross country road trip. Here, he shares the top apps that made getting from Point A to Point B not only easier, but more fun. Get ready to download a few. Road trips are one of my favorite ways to explore the United States.
